Design.Colors:: Dusk Blue, Dawn Orange, Midnight Black
Design.Materials:: Glass front, titanium alloy frame, fiber-reinforced plastic back
Design.Biometrics:: Accelerometer, gyro, heart rate, SpO2, compass, barometer, depth, temperature
Design.Resistance::
IP69 dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)
5 ATM
40m swimproof/diving (EN13319)
ECG certified

Display.Features:: Accelerometer, gyro, heart rate, SpO2, compass, barometer, depth, temperature

Connectivity & Features.Sensors:: Accelerometer, gyro, heart rate, SpO2, compass, barometer, depth, temperature
Connectivity & Features.Location:: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), GLONASS, NavIC
